fields.name: Police Oversight (Passive):
fields.value: If you target is neither a Town Investigative, Town Killing, nor police-themed role, your chosen ability will fail and behave unpredictably.

fields.name: Audit Reports (Charge 50%):
fields.value: Learn the player your target most recently visited (or one randomly if they performed multiple visits the same night). If this ability fails due to Police Oversight, you will learn a random player your target could have visited.

fields.name: Verify Credentials (Charge 150%):
fields.value: Learn your target's exact role. If this ability fails due to Police Oversight, you instead learn a random role which could be subject to Police Oversight.

fields.name: Compliance Training (3x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Target a player during the day phase and name a player to force them to target tonight. If this ability fails due to Police Oversight, you will instead roleblock your target. This ability returns no feedback.
